name: Carrying out a successful post occupancy evaluation
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: Post occupancy evaluations are an important mechanism to deliver feedback and strategy for achieving best operational performance of new and refurbished buildings. This session examines the detail of what a successful POE looks like and how to feed the evaluation outcomes into future improvements.

presentations.name: Using the evidence under our noses
presentations.speakers: Bill Bordass, Research & Policy Adviser, Usable Buildings Trust

presentations.name: Case Study - domestic
presentations.speakers: Dr Tim Sharpe, Director, The Mackintosh Environmental Architecture Research Unit (MEARU)
